page.title: 03PLAYGROUND GAMES IN OAKLEY
page.content: At Inzievar primary we did a survey of playground games.Football was the most popular boy's game and then toy fighting.The girls like{Clockworks} best.In this game one person spins everybody round then lets go.They each form a shape.She tells them what they look like and they must act like it. She says Clockworks sleep everybody flops down and shuts their eyes.She dances round and taps people who then follow her.After tapping them all bar one they all shake this one saying wakey,wakey,sleepy head,don't forget to make your bed.This person is now up.Racing and tig were the most popu- lar mixed games.Younger pupils played imaginary games such as Cops and Robbers or T.V.cartoon adventures. Games such as{badminton and netball} are practised.In the summer time they practise for the school sports.
